Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Come on! Stop getting on my way!

Lines.Speaker: IG-12
Lines.Text: I detect a hostile/angry tone in your voice. I recommend you to sit down and rest.

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: You know. If they gave me an imperial credit for every time I destroyed you I would be rich

Lines.Speaker: IG-12
Lines.Text: Sorry to say but Imperial Credits value is decreasing fast.

Lines.Speaker: IG-12
Lines.Text: Right now its value is under the 5% of the current currency we are using and…

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Really? Apart from a Bounty Hunter you are an economist? Did not notice...

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Hey YOU. Why do not you just step apart. I am getting tired of destroying you that many times.

Lines.Speaker: IG-11
Lines.Text: That goes against my programmed orders.

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Same shitty speech I guess. Well, at least I warned you…
